name: Sharing Soul
description:
Sharing Soul is a puzzle platformer where you play as 2 people with only one soul that is shared between them.

you as the player can only control the character that has the soul, to control the other character you need to shoot the soul into the other character.

this game was made for the Brakeys jam in the last 3 days of the jam.

i didn't put time into the tutorial because i didn't feel like it, sorry for that.

controls:

arrows to move

C or up to jump

X to switch between moving and aiming

arrows to aim

Z to shoot
